#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define fastScan ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(NULL);
using namespace std;
typedef pair <ll, ll> pll;

set<ll> vis;
map<ll, ll> M;

ll solve(ll n) {
  if(n == 1) return 1;
  if(n == 2) return 3;
  if(vis.count(n)) return M[n];
  vis.insert(n);
  return M[n] = 1 + solve(n / 2) + solve(n - (n / 2));
}

int main() {

    fastScan;

    ll t;
    cin >> t;

    while(t--) {
      ll n;
      cin >> n;
      cout << 2 * n - 1 << endl;
    }
     
    return 0;
}
